action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

attrs.script:
set -x
base_url=$(echo "@@{callback_url}@@" |sed 's/\/api\/.*$//')
user=admin
password=password

url=$( curl -o /tmp/$$ -u ${user}:${password} -v -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -XPOST \
  --data '{"host_config_key": "@@{host_config_key}@@", "extra_vars": "{\"vm1ip\": \"@@{address}@@\", \"vm1hostname\": \"@@{name}@@\", \"vm2ip\": \"@@{VM2.address}@@\", \"vm2hostname\": \"@@{VM2.name}@@\"}", "limit": "@@{address}@@,@@{VM2.address}@@"}' \
  ${base_url}/api/v2/job_templates/10/launch/ 2>&1 |grep Location |awk '{print $NF}' )

cat /tmp/$$

echo "job2_url="${url}

exit 0

job_url = "@@{job2_url}@@"
user = "admin"
password = "password"

def process_request(url, method, user, password, headers, payload=None):
  r = urlreq(url, verb=method, auth="BASIC", user=user, passwd=password, params=payload, verify=False, headers=headers)
  return r

headers = {"Accept": "application/json", "Content-Type": "application/json"}
base_url = re.sub("\/api\/.*$","","@@{callback_url}@@")
url = base_url + job_url
url_method = "GET"

while 1 == 1:
  r = process_request(url, url_method, user, password, headers)
  print "Response Status: " + str(r.status_code)
  print r.text
  ret = r.json()
  print ret["status"]
  if ret["status"] == "successful" or ret["status"] == "failed":
    break
  else:
    sleep(5)

set -x
job_url="@@{job2_url}@@"
user="admin"
password="password"

base_url=$(echo "@@{callback_url}@@" |sed 's/\/api\/.*$//')
url=$(echo "${base_url}""${job_url}""stdout/?format=txt_download")

curl -k -H 'Content-Type: application/json' --user ${user}:${password} ${url}

action_list.name: action_create

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
disable_root: False
ssh_enabled: True
ssh_pwauth: True
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{centos.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

  @@{callback_url}@@ 2>&1 |grep 'Location' |awk '{print $NF}')

echo "job_url="${url}
